public class BCKPicture
extends JPanel
Description - A JPanel that is used to display a picture. You can pass the file as a string to the constructor or to the method setImage();

Constructor
BCKPicture(String)
Constructor.

getImage()
Returns the AWT Image that is displayed on the JPanel
paintComponent(Graphics)
Paints the current image on to the JPanel

Set the image to display on the JPanel.
